Name: Ostracon depicting Meretseger
Description: The ostracon shows a sketch of Meretseger as a uraeus with a feathered crown on her head on a base. The hood of the snake is extended and she is wriggling to the right. Behind her, on the left, is a papyrus bundle; on the right in front of her is an offering table with offerings. On either side of the standard is a jug with entwined lotus on a stand.
